org.forgerock.openig.script

Class AbstractScriptableHeapObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openig.heap.GenericHeapObject
      • org.forgerock.openig.script.AbstractScriptableHeapObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScriptableFilter, ScriptableHandler

    public abstract class AbstractScriptableHeapObject
extends GenericHeapObject
    An abstract scriptable heap object which should be used as the base class for implementing filters and handlers. This heap object acts as a simple wrapper around the scripting engine. Scripts are provided with the following variable bindings:
    • globals - the Map of global variables which persist across successive invocations of the script
    • exchange - the HTTP exchange
    • http - an OpenIG HTTP client which may be used for performing outbound HTTP requests
    • ldap - an OpenIG LDAP client which may be used for performing LDAP requests such as LDAP authentication
    • logger - the OpenIG logger
    • next - if the heap object is a filter then this variable will contain the next handler in the filter chain.

    NOTE: at the moment only Groovy is supported.

      • runScript

        protected final void runScript(Exchange exchange,
             Handler next)
                        throws HandlerException,
                               IOException
        Runs the compiled script using the provided exchange and optional forwarding handler.
        Parameters:
        exchange - The HTTP exchange.
        next - The next handler in the chain if applicable, may be null.
        Throws:
        HandlerException - If an error occurred while evaluating the script.
        IOException - If an I/O exception occurs.
